snippet.title: London Olympics 2012: It takes a village to house a world of athletes
snippet.description:
Tuesday May 15, 2012 12:04 pm
... touted its ethnic mix as a positive when bidding for the 2012 Games. Then-Prime Minister Tony Blair promised... is from Myanmar. That might be bizarre, unthinkable even, in a less cosmopolitan city, but it neatly captures
